title: Supports and S's??
body: Why do they seem to be harder not easier this patch. You have tuned the system so we can get more s's with the introduction of mastery 6/7 but I've done like 10 leona games I've got really good kda but still get an S- ???? How the .... do you get S on support????

replies.body: From experience, the most important thing I consider when trying to get an S rank on a support is dying as few times as possible. The more deaths you have the more kills/assists you'll need and depending on how many you end up having there's a point where an S rank becomes impossible. I think the change has made it so the value of assists equals that of kills but this still means low deaths and whatever else it tracks are still important.

I had a Ryze sup get an S- just now going 5/9/21. Not a huge amount of assists, didn't farm up a storm, we didn't have many wards, and he died a boatload for what was a short game, but oh boy 5 kills good game son heres an S-. I've gotten far better scores on Braum and Leona and only got A or even A-. So salty atm.
